education.description: 1000+ hours of programming. Aquired the skills to build full stack apps In three languages (Java, Python, Javascript). Earned 'Black Belt', Coding Dojo's distinguished and highest level of knowledge achievement.

testimonials.text: “I’ve missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.”
“He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.”
“Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.”
“خُودی کو کر بُلند اتنا کہ ہر تقدیر سے پہلے خُدا بندے سے خُود پوچھے بتا تیری رضا کیا ہے
“When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.”
